cleaned_text: SP Detox Balance Program - 28 or 10 Day Program SP Detox Balance Program - 28 or 10 Day Program from $84.50 The SP Detox Balance program includes a tasty, all-in-one shake, supported by sample meals. The SP Detox Balance powder is full of whole food-based nutritional ingredients, and is packed with 17 grams of protein. The program features two options — a 28-day or 10-day plan. After you take the Toxicity Questionnaire, Dr. Heidi will recommend one of the options based on your results. You will then follow a simple regimen in the Program Guide, including the required number of shakes per day. Just mix the SP Detox Balance powder with water (or other approved beverage) and enjoy — morning, noon or night! Program Length: Flavor: Quantity: Add To Cart
